Title: Relates to consideration of capital expenditures in rate proceedings
Summary: Requires that any proposed capital expenditure to be considered in any matter affecting a major change in rates must be described by the utility on a per project basis and shall include the purpose and the need for each capital expenditure, total cost, and benefits to the ratepayers and the operation of the distribution system, and shall be posted on the PSC website.
LawCode: Amd ยง66, Pub Serv L (as proposed in S.8213 & A.2736-A)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to consideration of capital expenditures by a utility proposing a major change in rates
